description: This painting is called "Girl in the shirt (Red-haired girl)" and it was painted by Amedeo Modigliani. It is an oil painting on canvas that measures 73 cm by 50 cm. The painting depicts a woman who is wearing a white shirt. She has red hair and her breasts are exposed. The background of the painting is blue. The woman's face is in profile and she appears to be looking off into the distance. The overall mood of the painting is one of loneliness and sadness.
